Custom function for min-max-normalization
Fehler in match.fun(FUN) : Argument "FUN" fehlt (ohne Standardwert)
```{r}
normalize <- function(x) {
  num <- x - min(x)
  denom <- max(x) - min(x)
  return (num/denom)
}

ds_norm[,31] <- as.data.frame(lapply(ds[,31]), normalize)
```
